text: I work for a company called Metova based in Franklin Tennessee, with another office in Conway Arkansas as well. We are growing fast, and are looking for more Android developers to join us. We have a great team in place and have an environment where you are responsible for your own work, get to make decisions, and won’t be micromanaged by a project manager. If you are interested you can view the job posting here <http://metova.com/jobs/>. Or feel free to DM me and I can refer you directly to our hiring manager!
